Review of Contract Supervision and Monitoring Arrangements Preparation of progress reports Municipality supervised the works. Brief supervision reports were found on file but with very little detail about progress of works. No detailed progress reports were prepared and no completion report availed to the auditors. It was therefore considered unavailable. Reluctance by the municipality to prepare project specific reports.
